Cell sorting.EditorialNote: Eagle i has "Cell separation" as the preferred label.  I chose "Cell sorting" because I thought it would be more likely used in search, although I have no objective basis for this decision.
Cell sorting.Definition: A material component separation technique used to separate populations of two or more cells, such as by magnetic bead sorting (Eagle i Resource Ontology:  http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ERO_0000725)
